title: Chrysanthemum
description: Reeded globular body, engraved with foliate monogram "RMA", rising to tall slightly bulging cylindrical neck with wavy rim; loop handle with ivory insulators on one side, and long curved spout heavily decorated with chrysanthemums and foliage opposite; base with four foliate feet. Slightly domed and reeded lid with flower bud knop.
name: Coffeepot
